message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of functional compression in networks, which involves computation of functions of sources located at certain nodes in a network at the receiver(s). This problem is related to information theory (cs.IT), networked systems (cs.NI), distributed computing (cs.DC), signal processing (cs.SI), and coding theory (cs.CC). The paper presents results that significantly relax the assumptions made in the literature, making it relevant to a wide range of sub-categories in computer science.
